item.description:
For the person that just wants to have fun while getting in shape, this class is perfect. A different routine will be taught each week. Music will vary anywhere from Janet Jackson to Missy Elliot but feel free to bring in any music you would like. This class will build and strengthen lean muscle, increase flexibility, and shed calories. The class includes stretching, a cardio warm up, and a fun new dance routine each week.

The hour long class is $10 or you can get a ten pack for $90 (you can mix and match with Strip Fit and Bridget's bootcamp class)

There's no dress code, just wear something you're comfortable in that allows a full range of motion and sneakers.

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: Hip Hop
